findings.title: ST - Stop Transactions
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop transactions for all users excluding the owner by setting the `_maxTxAmount` to zero.

findings.title: Contract Owner is not able to stop or pause transactions
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop transactions for all users excluding the owner. The owner may take advantage of it by setting the `_maxTxAmount` to zero.
